column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I had the roast chicken with a side of elotes-style corn. Amazing. This is the way chicken is supposed to taste. Crispy
column3: juicy insides...perfection in poultry form is found here. Of course
column4: our table imbibed in a bit of the boeuf as well. Cooked perfectly (as it should be
column5: the boeuf is in the title)
column6: it was juicy and lovely. A safe bet as well. Other sides that wowed: the frites
column8: and the roasted broccoli. Nothing that really blew my mind
column9: but all very tasty. I was surprised at the portion sizes. We all had leftovers (and took them to go)
column10: which so rarely happens at nicer restaurants.
